name: Alter Light
description:
A simple and easy to play stealth-puzzle game where the main character descents through levels of an underground robot complex. To complete every level, you must charge his energy and reach the exit door. But be careful! An assortment of robots and security devices will make it quite difficult.

Developed by Daring Fox Studio.

******************************************************

Daring Fox Studios is a very small video game development studio comprised of three passionate Uni students. The studio was created as part of their course and Alter Light is their very first published game.
